config-option.enabled.name: Enabled
config-option.enabled.description: Enable features for this chest type.
config-option.enable-scrolling.name: Enable Scroll Wheel
config-option.enable-scrolling.descripti: Enable the scrolling up and down the chest menu.
config-option.enable-search.name: Enable Search
config-option.enable-search.description: Enable the search bar in the chest menu.
config-option.menu-size.name: Menu Size
config-option.menu-size.description: Set the size of the menu for this chest type.
config-option.show-arrows.name: Show Arrow Buttons
config-option.show-arrows.description: Show the arrow buttons on the chest menu.
config-option.toggle-search.name: Toggle Search
config-option.toggle-search.description: Keybind to toggle the search bar on or off.
config-option.unlimited.name: Unlimited
config-option.unlimited.description: Make the chest type hold unlimited items.
